summary: Dynamic Wizard Engine feature fully tested. Backend: 10/10 tests passed for wizard settings API (step_title, step_description, continue_button_label, pause_after, variable_config, node-specific options). Frontend: All wizard features verified - pipeline selector shows available pipelines with step preview, wizard progress bar dynamically shows stages from pipeline, template stage shows configured variable fields with labels/placeholders from variable_config, NodeConfigPanel shows 'Настройки визарда' section with character counters (40/200/25), node-specific options sections visible for user_edit_list (pink) and user_review (teal).

pipeline_selector_on_setup.description: Pipeline selector on wizard setup screen shows available pipelines
pipeline_selector_on_setup.verification: Select dropdown shows 'Стандартный анализ встречи' and other pipelines

pipeline_step_preview.description: Pipeline step preview shows when pipeline is selected
pipeline_step_preview.verification: Shows 4 step badges: Настройка → Темы → Анализ → Результат

wizard_start_navigation.description: Clicking Start navigates to first wizard stage
wizard_start_navigation.verification: Clicking 'Запустить сценарий' shows template stage with progress bar

template_stage_variable_fields.description: Template stage shows configured variable fields from variable_config
template_stage_variable_fields.verification: Label 'Предмет обсуждения', placeholder, and required marker displayed correctly

wizard_progress_bar_dynamic.description: Progress bar dynamically shows stages from pipeline
wizard_progress_bar_dynamic.verification: Progress bar shows 4 dynamic stages with icons: Настройка, Темы, Анализ, Результат

node_config_wizard_settings_section.verification: Section visible with toggle, expands to show step_title, step_description, continue_button_label fields

character_counters.verification: step_title shows 9/40, step_description shows 32/200, continue_button_label shows 12/25

template_variable_config.description: Template node wizard settings include variable configuration
template_variable_config.verification: Shows {{meeting_subject}} with label, placeholder, type dropdown, required checkbox

user_edit_list_options.description: user_edit_list node shows allow_add, allow_edit, allow_delete, min_selected options
user_edit_list_options.verification: 'ОПЦИИ СПИСКА' (pink section) shows all 4 options with toggles and number input

user_review_options.description: user_review node shows allow_review_edit, show_export, show_save options
user_review_options.verification: 'ОПЦИИ ПРОСМОТРА' (teal section) shows all 3 options with toggles

pause_after_toggle.verification: batch_loop node shows 'Настройки визарда' section with pause_after option

passed_tests: Backend: GET /pipelines returns wizard fields on all nodes
Backend: Template node has step_title='Настройка', variable_config with label/placeholder/type/required
Backend: user_edit_list node has allow_add, allow_edit, allow_delete, min_selected options
Backend: user_review node has allow_review_edit, show_export, show_save options
Backend: Non-interactive node (batch_loop) has pause_after=true
Backend: POST /pipelines accepts and persists wizard settings
Backend: PUT /pipelines updates wizard settings correctly
Backend: Character limits respected (40, 200, 25)
Backend: Seeded pipeline has interactive nodes (template, user_edit_list, user_review)
Backend: Edges define execution order correctly
Frontend: Login and navigation to Мастер tab
Frontend: Pipeline selector shows available pipelines
Frontend: Pipeline step preview shows dynamic stages
Frontend: Start button navigates to first wizard stage
Frontend: Wizard progress bar shows dynamic stages from pipeline
Frontend: Template stage shows variable fields with configured labels/placeholders
Frontend: Submit button shows configured text 'Извлечь темы'
Frontend: NodeConfigPanel shows 'Настройки визарда' toggle section
Frontend: Character counters visible (9/40, 32/200, 12/25)
Frontend: Template variable config shows label, placeholder, type, required fields
Frontend: user_edit_list config shows 'ОПЦИИ СПИСКА' pink section with all options
Frontend: user_review config shows 'ОПЦИИ ПРОСМОТРА' teal section with all options
Frontend: batch_loop config shows 'Настройки визарда' section
critical_code_review_comments: Wizard settings UI is well-implemented with proper character counters and node-specific sections
Variable configuration for template nodes works correctly with label/placeholder/type/required
Progress bar dynamically renders stages from pipeline nodes
Node-specific options (user_edit_list and user_review) properly styled with color-coded sections
All data-testid attributes present for testing
seed_data_creation: Used existing seeded pipeline 'Стандартный анализ встречи' with wizard settings configured
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dynamic Wizard Engine is fully functional. The wizard dynamically renders UI based on pipeline nodes. Template nodes show variable_config fields, user_edit_list shows list options, user_review shows view options. Non-interactive nodes can have pause_after to create visible stages. Character limits enforced (40/200/25). Backend API properly stores and returns all wizard settings fields.
